articles.description: An intense scene unfolded in front of Park City's Main Street Pizza & Noodle as several hundred protesters lined the sidewalk amid a crush of Sundance attendees on the busy block.
articles.content: Traffic on Main Street in Park City came to a complete halt on a busy Sunday afternoon during the Sundance Film Festival as several hundred pro-Palestinian protesters — among them actors Melissa Barr… [+9113 chars]

articles.author: Michael Boyle
articles.title: Saturday Night Live Spent An Entire Episode Thirsting After Jacob Elordi - SlashFilm
articles.description: Jacob Elordi hosted the first Saturday Night Live episode of 2024, and there was a noticeable theme to the sketches.
articles.content: The "Saturday Night Live" episode seems to fully understand Elordi's main appeal at the moment. His most recent movie, "Saltburn," is filled with lustful montages of him. The dude spent seemingly hal… [+1262 chars]
